comments.content:
If you widen Rian Hughes’ [Popgod](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214834/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/popgod/) you get something pretty similar, I think.

- Mike Yanega

There are 10 types of people:  
Those that understand the binary system,  
and those that don’t.
